early.description: Born and raised within the walls of a corporate military garrison, you knew little of life outside strict routines and training drills.
At age six, you were enrolled in a rigorous physical conditioning program, pushing your limits daily.
You witnessed a training accident that resulted in the injury of a fellow child recruit, instilling a sense of caution and the seriousness of your environment.
Raised by military caretakers rather than parents, you learned to suppress emotions and focus on objectives.
You excelled in hand-to-hand combat drills, showing exceptional strength for your age.
A mentor singled you out for advanced training, increasing both your skills and the expectations placed upon you.
You formed a close bond with another recruit, vowing to look out for each other amidst the harsh training regime.
Punished for a minor infraction, you learned the consequences of stepping out of line within the garrison.
An injury during a training exercise left you temporarily sidelined, teaching you resilience and determination to recover.
You discovered a hidden area within the garrison, providing a brief escape from the relentless discipline.
Witnessing unfair treatment of another recruit, you grappled with the strict hierarchy and your place within it.
You participated in a simulated battle that felt all too real, leaving a lasting impression on your psyche.
A strict diet and regimen sculpted your physique, but left little room for personal freedom.
You showed a natural aptitude with weapons, impressing your instructors and peers.
An unexpected act of kindness from a superior challenged your perceptions of authority.
You began to question the purpose of your training, wondering about life beyond the garrison walls.
A rumor of a world outside the garrison sparked your curiosity and a desire for knowledge.

mid.description: You led your squad to victory in a competitive exercise, showcasing leadership and tactical prowess.
A close friend attempted to escape the garrison; their fate remained unknown, leaving you conflicted.
You were selected for specialized training in heavy weaponry, increasing your value but also your burden.
An encounter with corporate officials revealed the true nature of your purpose, shaking your beliefs.
You uncovered a secret about the garrison's operations, forcing you to choose between compliance and conscience.
A severe disciplinary action left physical and emotional scars, hardening your resolve.
You excelled in endurance training, setting records that drew attention from higher-ups.
Witnessing an act of defiance by another recruit inspired you to question your own obedience.
You developed a rivalry with another trainee, pushing both of you to greater heights but also increasing tension.
An injury sustained during a live-fire exercise tested your limits and recovery capabilities.
You were tasked with training new recruits, giving you a taste of leadership and responsibility.
A clandestine meeting with an outsider provided new perspectives, challenging your indoctrination.
You participated in a high-stakes simulation that blurred the lines between training and reality.
An act of sabotage within the garrison raised suspicions and increased surveillance.
You began to experience recurring nightmares, affecting your performance and mental state.
A brief glimpse of life outside during a transport mission ignited a longing for freedom.
You crafted a makeshift keepsake or token, a small act of rebellion against the uniformity imposed upon you.

late.description: Promoted to a leadership role, you now oversee a unit, grappling with the weight of command.
An opportunity to leave the garrison presented itself, forcing you to choose between duty and desire.
You uncovered a plan that would endanger many lives; acting on this knowledge could be considered treason.
A close comrade fell in action, causing you to question the purpose of your relentless training.
You were ordered to suppress a civilian uprising, challenging your morality and loyalty.
An injury left you with lasting effects, but you pushed through, refusing to be sidelined.
You began to mentor younger soldiers, passing on not just skills but also your evolving worldview.
An internal power struggle within the garrison hierarchy drew you into a web of intrigue.
You developed a plan to improve training methods, but faced resistance from traditionalists.
A chance encounter with a rebel operative offered you an alternative path.
You were assigned to a mission that required operating outside the garrison, testing your adaptability.
An ethical dilemma arose when ordered to carry out questionable actions; your choice defined your future.
You discovered a personal connection to someone outside the garrison, complicating your loyalties.
A significant failure or setback led to demotion or reassignment, challenging your identity.
You began to document your experiences, a forbidden act that could have severe consequences if discovered.
An uprising within the garrison forced you to choose sides, impacting your fate dramatically.
Facing the prospect of lifelong service without personal freedom, you contemplated drastic actions.
